page.title: 16BARNWELL PARK - GENERAL
page.content: Barnwell park lies just outside of {Oundle}along the A605. Barnwell Park consists of trees and vegetation, animals and birds.There are rivers and lakes where you can go fishing. Also there are disabled fishing areas.There are picnic areas eg tables and benches in different places around the park.There are toilets as you come through the gate.Barnwell Park is very interesting but it does have some drawbacks like there could be more signs put up around the park to show you the different animals and places, and when it has rained the paths are very muddy. Its advantages are that there are disabled fishing points. There are bird watching hides if you are a bird watcher.
